service.title: What's new?
service.description: Track user sentiment in the admin panel

about.title: Solutions for Digital Interaction
about.description: We are a team of experts in artificial intelligence and cutting-edge technologies. Our mission is to provide innovative solutions that transform the ways of digital interaction and communication. Combining our knowledge in machine learning, natural language processing, and software development, we have created a unique AI assistant for messaging platforms. It will help your company stay at the forefront of digital communications and provide your customers with unparalleled service.

howItWorks.title: in 4 Easy Steps
howItWorks.description: Integrate our innovative AI assistant into your digital channels in just three easy steps. Get a powerful tool to enhance customer interactions.

features.title: Create Your Assistant
features.description: Start by creating your own virtual assistant using our intuitive platform. Give it a name, personality, and other parameters.

features.title: Add Messaging Channels
features.description: The second step is to integrate your assistant with popular messaging channels like Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Telegram, and others.

features.title: Train Your Assistant
features.description: Our machine learning system will quickly 'teach' your assistant about your product line, industry terminology, and best customer service practices.

features.title: Optimize and Scale
features.description: Continuous analysis of interactions and feedback allows you to constantly improve your assistant's performance. Easily scale as your business grows.

services.title: Not All
services.description: Our AI assistant provides a wide range of features and services designed to improve customer interaction efficiency, enhance analytics, and streamline communication management.

features.title: Customer Sentiment Analysis
features.description: Track user sentiment and emotional tone during conversations with the assistant. Gain valuable data to improve service quality.

features.title: Unified Communication Platform
features.description: Communicate with customers across all popular messaging channels and manage dialogues from a single, simple interface. No more scattered data.

features.title: Personalized Conversation Scenarios
features.description: Create individual conversation scenarios for different situations - sales, support, marketing. The assistant will operate within the defined strategy.

cta.title: Trial
cta.description: Experience the full benefits of our platform risk-free. Just sign up and explore the possibilities of managing communications from a single interface for 2 weeks.

newsletter.title: Be the First to Know About the Latest AI Developments
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter and stay up-to-date with the latest advancements and trends

testimonials.title: Choose Our Platform
testimonials.description: See what companies have to say about the benefits of unifying all customer communications in a single interface.

reviews.name: John Smith
reviews.comment: GPT/HELP's AI assistant has been a game-changer for our customer support team. It handles a vast majority of routine inquiries, significantly reducing the workload on our agents while maintaining top-notch service quality.

reviews.name: Emily Johnson
reviews.comment: The unified communication platform has streamlined our entire marketing workflow. We can now manage all client interactions from a single interface, ensuring a consistent and efficient experience.

reviews.name: Michael Brown
reviews.comment: With GPT/HELP, we've been able to respond to leads and customer inquiries much faster. The ability to assign ownership and track conversation history has given us complete control over the sales process.

reviews.name: Sarah Wilson
reviews.position: Customer Success Manager at SaaS Global
reviews.comment: The AI assistant's sentiment analysis feature has provided invaluable insights into our customers' experiences. We can now identify pain points and make data-driven improvements to boost satisfaction.

reviews.name: David Thompson
reviews.comment: GPT/HELP's AI assistant perfectly complements our client communication efforts, providing 24/7 information support. This has freed up our team's time to focus on more strategic tasks.
